Do you need to generate a sequence of dates? seq is still your friend. You can use it with a start, ending date and a by variable.

![](images/dates.png)

The by variable can be quite a few things: days, weeks, months, quarters or years.

More info can be found here: <https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/base/html/seq.Date.html>
